name: Array
description: Store an array of values in up to 3 dimensions.

conditions.name: Compare at X
conditions.description: Compare the value at an X position (1D) in the array.

params.name: X
params.description: X index (0-based) of array value to compare.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to compare the value.

params.name: Value
params.description: The value to compare the array value to.

conditions.name: Compare at XY
conditions.description: Compare the value at an X,Y position (2D) in the array.

params.name: X
params.description: X index (0-based) of array value to compare.

params.name: Y
params.description: Y index (0-based) of array value to compare.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to compare the value.

params.name: Value
params.description: The value to compare the array value to.

conditions.name: Compare at XYZ
conditions.description: Compare the value at an X,Y,Z position (3D) in the array.

params.name: X
params.description: X index (0-based) of array value to compare.

params.name: Y
params.description: Y index (0-based) of array value to compare.

params.name: Z
params.description: Z index (0-based) of array value to compare.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to compare the value.

params.name: Value
params.description: The value to compare the array value to.

conditions.name: Contains value
conditions.description: Test if the array contains a value (at any element).

params.name: Value
params.description: The value to test if in the array.

conditions.name: Is empty
conditions.description: Test if the array is empty and contains no elements.

conditions.name: Compare size
conditions.description: Compare the size of one of the array dimensions.

params.name: Axis
params.description: Select the axis to compare.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to compare the size of the given axis.

params.name: Value
params.description: The value to compare to.

conditions.name: For each element
conditions.description: Repeat the event for each element in the array.

params.name: Axes
params.description: Select which dimensions to iterate.  For example, if you have a 3D array, but only want to iterate in 2D, choose 'XY'.

conditions.name: Compare current value
conditions.description: Compare the value of the current element in a for-each loop.

params.name: Comparison
params.description: How to compare the current value in the for-each loop.

params.name: Value
params.description: The value to compare the array value to.

params.name: Value
params.description: The value to clear the entire array with.

actions.name: Set size
actions.description: Set the number of elements on each axis of the array.

params.name: Width
params.description: The new number of elements on the X axis.

params.name: Height
params.description: The new number of elements on the Y axis.

params.name: Depth
params.description: The new number of elements on the Z axis.

actions.name: Set at X
actions.description: Set the value at an X position (1D) in the array.

params.name: X
params.description: The X index (0-based) of the array value to set.

params.name: Value
params.description: The value to store in the array.

actions.name: Set at XY
actions.description: Set the value at an X,Y position (2D) in the array.

params.name: X
params.description: The X index (0-based) of the array value to set.

params.name: Y
params.description: The Y index (0-based) of the array value to set.

params.name: Value
params.description: The value to store in the array.

actions.name: Set at XYZ
actions.description: Set the value at an X,Y,Z position (3D) in the array.

params.name: X
params.description: The X index (0-based) of the array value to set.

params.name: Y
params.description: The Y index (0-based) of the array value to set.

params.name: Z
params.description: The Z index (0-based) of the array value to set.

params.name: Value
params.description: The value to store in the array.

actions.name: Load
actions.description: Load from an array previously encoded in JSON format.

params.name: JSON
params.description: A string of the JSON data to load.

actions.name: Download
actions.description: Download the contents of the array as a JSON file.
actions.display_text: Download as JSON data with filename [i]{0}[/i]

params.name: Filename
params.description: The name of the file to download.

actions.name: Push
actions.description: Add a new element to the front or back of an axis.

params.name: Where
params.description: Whether to insert at the beginning or the end of the array.

params.name: Value
params.description: The value to insert to the array.

params.name: Axis
params.description: The axis to insert on.

actions.name: Pop
actions.description: Remove an element from the front or back of an axis.

params.name: Where
params.description: Whether to remove at the beginning or the end of the array.

params.name: Axis
params.description: The axis to remove from.

actions.name: Reverse
actions.description: Reverse the order of elements on an axis.

params.name: Axis
params.description: The axis to reverse.

actions.name: Delete
actions.description: Delete an element from an axis.

params.name: Index
params.description: The zero-based index to delete.

params.name: Axis
params.description: The axis to delete from.

actions.name: Insert
actions.description: Insert a new element at an index on an axis.

params.name: Value
params.description: The value to insert to the array.

params.name: Index
params.description: The zero-based index to insert to.

params.name: Axis
params.description: The axis to insert to.

actions.name: Split string
actions.description: Set to a one-dimensional array based on splitting a string, e.g. "1,2,3".

params.name: String
params.description: The string to split.

params.name: Separator
params.description: The character to use to split the string.

params.name: Type
params.description: The data type of the values to set.

actions.name: Shuffle
actions.description: Sort the elements on an axis in to a random ordering.

params.name: Axis
params.description: The axis to shuffle.

actions.name: Sort
actions.description: Sort the elements on an axis.

params.name: Axis
params.description: The axis to sort.

expressions.name: At
expressions.description: Get value from the array.  Add second or third parameters to specify Y and Z indices.

params.name: X
params.description: The X index (0-based) of the array value to get.

expressions.name: Width
expressions.description: Get the number of elements on the X axis of the array.

expressions.name: Height
expressions.description: Get the number of elements on the Y axis of the array.

expressions.name: Depth
expressions.description: Get the number of elements on the Z axis of the array.

expressions.name: Front
expressions.description: Get the front value on the X axis (at 0, 0, 0).

expressions.name: Back
expressions.description: Get the back value on the X axis (at w-1, 0, 0).

expressions.name: IndexOf
expressions.description: Find first X index of matching value, or -1 if not found.

params.name: Value
params.description: Value to search for.

expressions.name: LastIndexOf
expressions.description: Find last X index of matching value, or -1 if not found.

params.name: Value
params.description: Value to search for.

expressions.name: CurX
expressions.description: Get the current X index in a For Each loop.

expressions.name: CurY
expressions.description: Get the current Y index in a For Each loop.

expressions.name: CurZ
expressions.description: Get the current Z index in a For Each loop.

expressions.name: CurValue
expressions.description: Get the current value in a For Each loop.

expressions.name: AsJSON
expressions.description: Return the contents of the array in JSON format.

expressions.name: JoinString
expressions.description: Combine a one-dimensional array back in to a string.

params.name: Separator
params.description: The character to use to join the string.
